text: But the people answered, Thou shalt not go forth: for if we flee away, they will not care for us; neither if half of us die, will they care for us: but now thou art worth ten thousand of us: therefore now it is better that thou succour us out of the city.18.3 care…: Heb. set their heart on us18.3 worth…: Heb. as ten thousand of us18.3 succour: Heb. be to succour or help
